div.bibl: Narod Polski, May 25, 1904 Vo. VIII No. 21Chicago -- "The Nest of the Polish Army

body.p: Berlin-- In the Prussian Diet, Minister Hammerstein maintained that from revolutionary documents intercepted at the Warsaw and Cracow, ther exists in Chicago an alliance of a future army of Polish insurrectionists, that there also the youth are being trained to become officers and sub-officers.
The Polish members laughed in his face but this did not seem to prevent him from talking nonsense to the Prussians.
